content: purchase 2 patterns get 10% off purchase 3 patterns get 15% off no code necessary **aspen neck warmer** the aspen neck warmer is a simple bulky cowl worked flat and joined in the back it is a gender neutral design that coordinates with not only the aspen collection but also the cypress collection it can be folded down like a turtle neck or worn tall to help protect your face from the cold pair it with the cypress beanie or the aspen headband to make a set it makes a great handmade gift for men this pattern is beginner friendly with written instructions for finding the back loop of a stitch as well as a photo tutorial for joining the seam you will need bulky weight 5 yarn or 2 strands of worsted or aran weight 4 yarn if you are using a lighter weight 5 or two strands of worsted weight you may need to make adjustments to meet gauge and your neck warmer may be lighter weight with more open stitches written in english using u s terms this pattern has been tested **what you will need ** yarn - approx 140 yds of bulky weight or 275 yds of worsted /aran weight hooks - u s l/8 mm or any hook to meet gauge needle for weaving in ends find me at www winterwooldesigns com 1 1 https //www winterwooldesigns com/
